TopicTitle: Game Crash while driving space plane

Articles.Content:
This has happened twice. Been playing the game for a couple weeks. I have had no issues with rockets, but I've had the game crash when doing things with "space planes". I use the quotes because these vehicles actually don't have wings, I just drive them around collecting info from the biomes.

Once it crashed when I hit "revert to assembly" (see files in 2015-01-11_004440 folder)

then it crashed at end of runway as I was exiting my vehicle to repair some wheels (see 2015-01-10_234126 folder)

I'm running Win 7 Pro with all current updates.

KSP Version 0.90.0.75 (no mods) on Steam.

Links to crash folders

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B5bMKKOgnnXRbzRmcTRENEdqd28&usp=drive_web

image fix

I don't know how many times my client has crashed in 1.0.x using space planes. I've long since lost count. It's horrible. It most often happens when landing, but it seems to be random enough that I can't pinpoint any particular cause. It makes any mission involving them so frustrating and immersion-breaking that I now avoid them like the plague. Who wants to quicksave every 5 minutes out of fear of losing hours of work?

For kicks today, I went back to one of my last 1.0.x space plane designs using tubojets, modified it to be a SSTO supported by RAPIERs, and all went well until I went to land. The game crashed when I was on final approach, around 500m in altitude.
ksp is so crashy for me..makes me sad. have tried many things.
